Class BuildGraph

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--BuildGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BuildGraph
extends java.lang.Thread

This program uses the various graph classes (ERGraph, FixedGraph, FromFile, Homogenous, Scale-free) to implement different types of graphs using an already existing text file named config or a program-user dialog through Command-Prompt.

Field Summary
protected static boolean analyze
          Specifies whether the user wants to post-process the graph (analyze=true) or not (analyze=false).
protected static java.lang.String classpath
          The classpath in which user files will be stored.
protected static java.lang.String ffpath
          The path and name of the pre-preapred graph text file.
protected static int m
          The probability which is used for building random graphs Erdos Reny and Custom.
protected static int neighbors
          The graph degree which is used only for random graphs with fixed connectivity.
protected static int numOfEdges
          The number of edges which is used only for custom random and scale-free graphs .
protected static int numOfInitNodes
           
protected static int numOfVertices
          The number of vertices/nodes is stored .
protected static boolean postPrcs
          Specifies whether the user wants to post-process the Random graph with Fixed Connectivity (postPrcs==true) or not (postPrcs==false).
protected static double prob
           
protected static int seed
          The seed number that feeds the random pseudogenerator and allows the creation of reproducible graphs.
protected static java.lang.String typeOfmodel
          The graph topology model which will be simulated.
static double version
